pepc-e/special_start.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                SPECIAL_START
00004 !
00005 !  Initialise set of particles with zero velocity
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine special_start(iconf)
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use utils
00013   implicit none
00014 
00015   integer, intent(in) :: iconf  ! Configuration switch
00016   integer :: i,iseed=-17
00017   real :: gamma0,yt,zt
00018 
00019   r_beam=sigma/2.
00020   gamma0=sqrt(1+vosc**2/2.)
00021 
00022   config: select case(iconf)
00023   case(1)  ! electron disc at x=0 with 2pi phase spread
00024 
00025      do while (i < npp)
00026         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00027 
00028         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00029         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00030            i = i+1
00031            x(i) = 2*pi*rano(iseed)
00032            y(i) = yt + focus(2)
00033            z(i) = zt + focus(3)
00034            ux(i) = 0.
00035            uy(i) = 0.
00036            uz(i) = 0.
00037 
00038         endif
00039      end do
00040   case(2)
00041      x_crit = focus(1)
00042      ! electron disc at laser focus with 2pi phase spread
00043      do while (i < npp)
00044         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00045 
00046         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed)-1.)
00047         if (yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00048            i = i+1
00049            x(i) = focus(1)
00050            y(i) = yt + focus(2)
00051            z(i) = zt + focus(3)
00052            ux(i) = 0.
00053            uy(i) = 0.
00054            uz(i) = 0.
00055 
00056         endif
00057      end do
00058 
00059   end select config
00060 
00061   ex(1:nep) = 0.
00062   ey(1:nep) = 0.
00063   ez(1:nep) = 0.
00064   pot(1:nep) = 0.
00065   q(1:nep) = qe           ! plasma electrons
00066   m(1:nep) = mass_e            ! electron mass
00067   pelabel(1:nep) = my_rank*nep + (/ (i,i=1,nep) /)     ! Electron labels
00068   work(1:nep)  =1.
00069 
00070 end subroutine special_start
00071
